system.requirements: Not Ork or Kroot, RT Rank 2+. Has Tech-Use and Literacy Skills, has had contact/exposure to xenos or their technology.

description.value:
The Xenographer desires to understand all that there is to know about Xenos culture, technology, strategy, history, and language in a scholarly depth. The Value of such knowledge may be the only reason some of them are still alive.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Xenographer Can purchase Peer(Xenos) Talent as an Elite Advance for 200xp, where "Xenos" Represents a Xenos species character has formed working relationship with.
